title: Oklahoma County Detention Center Population Reports
text:
Last updated 2025-07-01 11:59:58.



This report analyzes how long people are detained in OCDC custody before being released or transferred to the custody of another agency.





This report focuses on those whose given address indicates that they were experiencing homelessness at the time of their booking.





This report focuses on the case status (pretrial vs. sentenced, etc.) of the people recently booked and currently held in OCDC.

title: Oklahoma County Detention Center Population Reports
text:
2 Appendices

2.1 Charge Description Appendix

Throughout the reports published here, we group charge descriptions together to make the data easier to understand (e.g. combining “CDS POSS.” and “POSSESS DRUG” into a single “Drug Possession” category). The appendix above lists the original charge descriptions and the categories we use in our reports.


All reports were compiled by the Oklahoma Policy Institute (OKPI). OK Policy is contracted by the Oklahoma County Criminal Justice Authority (CJAC) – an advisory body designed to oversee and advise the Oklahoma County Jail Trust, which manages the Oklahoma County Detention Center (OCDC) – to provide data analysis and reporting on OCDC and the people incarcerated there.
